structured.description: A man with a bald head and a full, reddish-brown beard is presented from the chest up, wearing professional business attire. He is smiling warmly at the viewer against a dark blue background featuring an abstract glowing network pattern, suggesting a tech-oriented or connected theme. The overall presentation conveys a sense of professionalism combined with an approachable and friendly demeanor.
structured.facial_features: Bald head, full reddish-brown beard, dark eyebrows, and visible ears.
structured.expression: A warm, open-mouthed smile with visible white teeth.
structured.attire: Black suit jacket, white collared shirt, and a light blue tie with subtle horizontal stripes.
structured.palette: Dominant dark blue, black, white, light blue, and warm skin tones with a reddish-brown beard.
structured.background: Dark blue background featuring a glowing, interconnected network or constellation pattern with bright nodes.

style_profile: neon-lit anime portrait with confident tech leader energy
